mainPage.javaScript: function Header(key,value) { this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value) { this.value = value; } function Output(lastEpisodes,lastAnimes) { this.lastEpisodes = lastEpisodes; this.lastAnimes = lastAnimes; } function LastAnimes(moduleID,image,link,title) { this.moduleID = moduleID; this.image = image; this.link = link; this.title = title; } function LastEpisodes(moduleID,image,link,title,episode) { this.moduleID = moduleID; this.image = image; this.link = link; this.title = title; this.episode = episode; } function MainPageObject(request,headers,method,extraInfo,loadJavascript,javaScript,output) { this.request = request; this.headers = headers; this.method = method; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; } var savedData = document.getElementById('katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = 'fsfr'; var headers = [new Header('','')]; var extraInfo = [new ExtraInfo('')]; var mainPageObject; var output; var lastAnimes = []; var lastEpisodes = []; var animeList = document.querySelectorAll('.owl-carousel, .caroustyle > .item'); for (var i = 1; i < animeList.length; i++){ var anime = animeList[i]; var image = anime.querySelector('img').src; image = 'https://french-anime.com/images' + image.split('/images')[1]; var link = anime.querySelector('a').href; var title = anime.querySelector('span').innerText; console.log(moduleID,image,link,title); lastAnimes.push(new LastAnimes(moduleID,image,link,title)); } var episodeList = document.querySelectorAll('.block-main > .mov'); for (var i = 1; i < episodeList.length; i++){ try{ var episodeItem = episodeList[i]; var image = episodeItem.querySelector('img').src; image = 'https://french-anime.com/images' + image.split('/images')[1]; var title = episodeItem.querySelector('a').innerText; var link = episodeItem.querySelector('a').href; episode = episodeItem.querySelector('.block-ep').innerHTML.trim(); episode = episode.split('Episode ')[1]; if (episode.includes(' Final')){ link = link + '#' + episode.split(' Final')[0]; } else{ link = link + '#' + episode; } console.log(image, link, title, episode); lastEpisodes.push(new LastEpisodes(moduleID,image,link,title,'Episode ' + episode)); } catch{} } while (lastEpisodes.length % 2 != 0) { lastEpisodes.push(lastEpisodes[0]); } while (lastAnimes.length % 3 != 0) { lastAnimes.push(lastAnimes[0]); } output = new Output(lastEpisodes,lastAnimes); mainPageObject = new MainPageObject('',headers,'',extraInfo,'','',output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(mainPageObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;

search.javaScript: function Header(key,value) { this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value) { this.value = value; } function Output(moduleID,image,link,title,type,voice,stars) { this.moduleID = moduleID; this.image = image; this.link = link; this.title = title; this.type = type; this.voice = voice; this.stars = stars; } function SearchObject(request,method,headers,separator,extraInfo,loadJavascript,javaScript,output) { this.request = request; this.method = method; this.headers = headers; this.separator = separator; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; } var savedData = document.getElementById('katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = 'fsfr'; var headers = [new Header('','')]; var extraInfo = [new ExtraInfo('')]; var searchPageObject; var output = []; var type = 'Anime'; var stars = '★★★'; var animeList = document.querySelectorAll('.mov'); for (var i = 0; i < animeList.length; i++){ var anime = animeList[i]; var voice = anime.querySelector('.ml-desc').innerHTML.trim(); var image = anime.querySelector('img').src; image = 'https://french-anime.com/images' + image.split('/images')[1]; var link = anime.querySelector('a').href; var title = anime.querySelector('a').innerText; console.log(moduleID,image,link,title,type,voice,stars); output.push(new Output(moduleID,image,link,title,type,voice,stars)); } searchPageObject = new SearchObject('','',headers,'+',extraInfo,'','',output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(searchPageObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;

info.javaScript: function Header(key,value) { this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value) { this.value = value; } function Output(moduleID,image,link,title,description,genres,type,status,episodes) { this.moduleID = moduleID; this.image = image; this.link = link; this.title = title; this.description = description; this.genres = genres; this.type = type; this.status = status; this.episodes = episodes; } function Episodes(link,moduleID,isDecodable) { this.link = link; this.moduleID = moduleID; this.isDecodable = isDecodable; } function InfoObject(request,method,headers,extraInfo,loadJavascript,javaScript,output) { this.request = request; this.method = method; this.headers = headers; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; } var savedData = document.getElementById('katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = 'fsfr'; var headers = [new Header('', '')]; var extraInfo = [new ExtraInfo('')]; var infoObject; var output; var episodes = []; var type = 'Anime'; var status = 'Unknowed'; var genres = []; var desc = document.querySelectorAll('.mov-desc')[5].innerText.trim(); if (desc.length < 10){ desc = document.querySelectorAll('.mov-desc')[6].innerText.trim(); } var image = document.querySelector('img').src; image = 'https://french-anime.com/images' + image.split('/images')[1]; var title = document.querySelector('img').alt; var grosTrucChiant = document.querySelector('#dle-content > article > div.tabsbox.filmlinks.ignore-select > div.tabs-sel.linkstab > div.eps') .innerHTML .trim() .split('!'); for (var i = 0; i < grosTrucChiant.length - 1; i++){ var episodeNumber = i + 1; episodes.push(new Episodes(parsedJson.request + '#' + episodeNumber,moduleID,'false')); } output = new Output(moduleID,image,parsedJson.request,title,desc,genres,type,status,episodes); infoObject = new InfoObject('','get',headers,extraInfo,'', '',output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(infoObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;

episodes.javaScript: function Header(key,value) { this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value) { this.value = value; } function Output(link,linkIdentifier,moduleID,isDecodable,headers) { this.link = link; this.linkIdentifier = linkIdentifier; this.moduleID = moduleID; this.isDecodable = isDecodable; this.headers = headers; } function EpisodeObject(request,method,headers,extraInfo,loadJavascript,javaScript,output) { this.request = request; this.method = method; this.headers = headers; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; } var savedData = document.getElementById('katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = 'fsfr'; var headers = [new Header('','')]; var extraInfo = [new ExtraInfo('')]; var episodeObject; var output = []; var grosTrucChiant = document.querySelector('#dle-content > article > div.tabsbox.filmlinks.ignore-select > div.tabs-sel.linkstab > div.eps') .innerHTML .trim() .split(' '); var episodeNumber = parsedJson.request.split('#')[1]; var episodeList = grosTrucChiant[episodeNumber - 1].split('!')[1].split(','); for (var i = 0; i < episodeList.length; i++){ var link = episodeList[i]; console.log(link); output.push(new Output(link,'',moduleID,'false',headers)) } episodeObject = new EpisodeObject('','',headers,extraInfo,'','',output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(episodeObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;
